A team of parapsychologists is proposed to search a number of anomalous phenomena that occur in a newly occupied apartment. Telephone mute, mysterious shadows, extraordinary light emissions, flying objects and exploding light bulbs are some of the events they will face during the investigation. Using infrared film, digital photography, recordings and motion detectors, plus the meters change in the magnetic field, the contacts that the group can do with the "other side" is so intense that, at some point, they realize that there is no more feedback ...
